message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,000. It's a great deal for you, as it's worth $8,000 to you. Let me know if you're interested!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6,000. I'm interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget. Can you meet me at this price?

Bob, I understand you're on a budget, but $6,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $7,500.  This still leaves me some room to make a profit, and I believe it's a fair price considering the value of the product to you. Let me know if you're interested in this offer.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down to $7,500, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $7,000. Can you consider this price?
